name: Peace, Karl!
description: roll_01_shot_04 In 1856 Australian stonemasons undertook the first ever mass stoppage to fight for the eight-hour workday. 165 years later a boy smiles in front of the Karl Marx's tomb at Highgate Cemetery in London. // The photograph was released on May 1st 2021 at 18:56 on The International Workers' Day. // Ilford single use black and white camera, 2021. Part of '36 shots', a series of photographs all shot on single-use cameras. @edgardubrovskiy
